mapper.select: select DETAIL_ID detailId,ORDER_ID orderId,PRODUCT_ID productId,QUANTITY quantity,LIST_PRICE listPrice,UNIT_COST unitCost,SUBTOTAL subtotal,STATUS status,CREATE_DATE createDate,UPDATE_DATE updateDate,DEL_FLG delFlg from BRN_ORDER_DETAIL where DETAIL_ID = #{detailId}
mapper.update: update BRN_ORDER_DETAIL set ORDER_ID = #{orderId} ,PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} ,QUANTITY = #{quantity} ,LIST_PRICE = #{listPrice} ,UNIT_COST = #{unitCost} ,SUBTOTAL = #{subtotal} ,STATUS = #{status} ,UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where DETAIL_ID = #{detailId} and UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate}
update BRN_ORDER_DETAIL set UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,DEL_FLG = 1 where UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate} and DEL_FLG = 0
